title: regexp not matching
body:
I want to match string that doesn't contain "admin"

```go
package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"regexp"
)

func main() {
	text := `admin Hello Hi.`
	reg := regexp.MustCompile(`^\b((?!admin)\w)+\b$`)
	fmt.Printf("%q\n", reg.FindAllString(text, -1))
}

```
But it not work. it there a way? Thanks.
